mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_APP (APP_NUM, USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_SAVE) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_APP.nextval, #{userId}, #{annNum}, #{appFile}, #{etc}, #{appSave})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_APP SET APP_FILE = #{appFile}, ETC = #{etc}, APP_SAVE = #{appSave} WHERE APP_NUM = #{appNum}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_REG_DATE, APP_SAVE FROM TBL_APP WHERE APP_NUM > 0 ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_REG_DATE, APP_SAVE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_APP_EVA WHERE TBL_APP_EVA.APP_NUM = APP.APP_NUM) AS EVA_END FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_APP WHERE ANN_NUM = #{keyword} ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) APP ) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, USER_ID, ANN_NUM, APP_NUM, APP_FILE, ETC, APP_REG_DATE, APP_SAVE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_APP_EVA WHERE TBL_APP_EVA.APP_NUM = APP.APP_NUM AND TBL_APP_EVA.RATER_ID =#{raterId}) AS EVA_END FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_APP WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNum} ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) APP ) WHERE (RNUM >= #{cri.pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{cri.pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_APP WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNum})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.ANN_NUM IN (SELECT ANN_NUM FROM TBL_APP WHERE USER_ID=#{keyword}) AND APP_SAVE=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, APP.APP_NUM,APP.ANN_NUM,APP.USER_ID, APP.APP_REG_DATE, ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.ANN_NUM IN (SELECT ANN_NUM FROM TBL_APP WHERE USER_ID=#{keyword}) AND APP_SAVE=0 ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.ANN_NUM IN (SELECT ANN_NUM FROM TBL_APP WHERE USER_ID=#{keyword}) AND APP_SAVE=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, APP.APP_NUM,APP.ANN_NUM,APP.USER_ID, APP.APP_REG_DATE, ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.ANN_NUM IN (SELECT ANN_NUM FROM TBL_APP WHERE USER_ID=#{keyword}) AND APP_SAVE=1 ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC
